title: Ep. 6: 'The Watch'
description:
Chris and Andy chat about the Grammy nominations (3:00), the Ryan Coogler 'Black Panther' rumors (8:00), 'The Nice Guys' trailer (11:00), and go deep on 'The Leftovers' season finale (12:00), and watching 'Focus' vs. 'The Gambler' on a flight (41:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
